attributes.action: Give us PROPER FREE PUBLIC SERVICES which are NOT financed through TAXATION!
attributes.additional_details:
Proposal https://helptheworld.live
English https://youtu.be/_rZRbLX6zW8
Turkish https://youtu.be/x_h5bU2jMZM

The current system of taxation is causing too many bad side effects due to lack of money. If we abolish lack of money then the side effects will be positive not negative. Our politicians should not have any money troubles when they go to Parliament or House of Commons. This way they can improve all aspects of the country.
attributes.background: The public & businesses pays for public services and this way the government doesn’t have enough money. They need unlimited funds from the Bank of England as grants. The Bank of England should not be restricted in their money making capabilities and not have to relie on reserves of gold and so on.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
